title: didn't get any changes from the patch the new skins and honor system is missing..... What happen?

replies.body: The [patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-713-notes) offers content that's aimed to release during the patch, not necessarily on the same day.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updates, and hang tight!

When this happens, please call it out at the top of the patch notes. It's pretty confusing to not have the new honor system when the first lines of the notes are 
> Welcome to patch 7.13, the one where Honor makes a comeback! At the end of every game youâ€™ll be able to honor one of your teammates with one of the new categories. GG? GG! <3
So the new honor system isn't actually out yet?
